snippet: Professor Gumperz created a subfield, known as interactional sociolinguistics, that studies exchanges in a range of social situations, especially discourse across cultures.
abstract: John J Gumperz, American linguist who created a subfield, known as interactional sociolinguistics, that studies exchanges in a range of social situations, especially discourse across cultures, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Professor Gumperz created a subfield, known as interactional sociolinguistics, that studies exchanges in a range of social situations, especially discourse across cultures.

headline.seo: John J. Gumperz, Linguist of Cultural Interchange, Dies at 91
headline.main: John J. Gumperz, Linguist of Cultural Interchange, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: John J. Gumperz, 91, Scholar of Interaction
